name: Median CoBrowse
short_description: Launch Median CoBrowse sessions directly from Zendesk Chat
long_description: Median CoBrowse enables your agents to see what your customers are doing on your website in realtime. Once Median has been installed, it's a snap to start a CoBrowsing session directly from Zendesk chat. With Median, you can collaborate with and delight your customers in realtime while resolving their questions faster.
installation_instructions: To use this Zendesk Chat integration, you'll first need to sign up for a Median account and install Median's JavaScript snippet on your website. Once that's done, the Zendesk Chat integration will automatically start working, no extra steps required.
